Who: Straight Shot
Location: Outside the pit near the ark

(OOC: Here is a description of the entrance to the tunnel/pit,
basically taken from the way it was originally created I am assuming
Straight Shot is shining some sort of light down to see, as it would
be dark after a few feet or so otherwise):

To call it a tunnel would be a bit of a misnomer as it is more of a
deep, dark and seemingly unending pit! It is roughly 8-10 feet wide
and it runs nearly straight down into the depths of the earth. Even
with artificial light its end point cannot be seen as it continued
into the darkness below. The sides are extremely smooth and sheer,
almost as if someone had cut it with some sort of high energy beam.

Several hundred feet down, nearly at the edge of the available light
there is a side shaft that appears to be running off in the direction
of Hydras' base. However to reach the side shaft one would need to be
able to fly or have extremely good climbing abilities, as there are no
hand holds and not even a single plant breaks the surface of the walls
lining this area.

From beneath the shaft the pit continues to drop into darkness, while
noxious fumes rise from below clearly show the danger of missing the
side shaft and plunging into the super heated depths. It would be a
grizzly end indeed.

(TAG)

Preston

OOC: I did some checking, in post #69197 Airly declared that the Black
Fortress is in Europe, and as we all know the Ark is in the US at the
foot of Mount St Helen. So we may want to curb the detections and
scans that can reach from the ark to the fortress unless we have some
sort of relay set up. There of course would be no relay down in these
tunnels. :)
